New Records: Aaron Boone reached his 500th win as New York Yankees manager
The New York Yankees swept a doubleheader at Fenway Park for the first time since 2006
Key Match Events: Rafaela homered in the first inning
The Yankees scored four runs with key hits from Florial and Bauers
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone's 500th win marked a significant milestone
The Yankees improved their standings and no longer trailed in the AL East
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Fenway Park with 30,392 attendees
Others: The Yankees' victory moved them above.500 and ended a month-long struggle
